name: solid-rock

effect.scarlet-violet: This Pokémon takes 0.75× as much damage from moves that are super effective against it. This ability functions identically to filter.
effect.the-teal-mask: This Pokémon takes 0.75× as much damage from moves that are super effective against it. This ability functions identically to filter.
effect.the-indigo-disk: This Pokémon takes 0.75× as much damage from moves that are super effective against it. This ability functions identically to filter.

short_effect: Decreases damage taken from super-effective moves by 1/4.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks that hit the Pokémon.
